nodes.text: The resurgent Sith Empire conquered the planet of Drezzi prior to the year 3954 BBY. Although the Sith Empire conquered Drezzi, defeated the resistance force, and executed her husband, Queen Ressa of Drezzi and her children were spared by Sith Lord Darth Nyriss. Ressa gave Darth Nyriss a holoprojection as a gift of thanks for sparing her own and her children's lives. Sometime later, the Sith Pureblood Sechel told the tale of Drezzi's fate to the Sith Lord Scourge.
The conquest of Drezzi was mentioned in the second chapter of the novel The Old Republic: Revan, written by Drew Karpyshyn and published on November 15, 2011.
